short_summary: SharePoint support services to assist in thetroubleshooting of specific issues and development/evolution of new solutions
description: The RCMP (Royal Canadian Mounted Police), Federal Technology Solutions group (FTS), under the Federal PolicingResource Management (FPRM) section, is seeking the services of in-depth SharePoint Support Services to assist in the troubleshooting of specific issues and development/evolution of new solutions. Issues include but are not limited to: assistance in migrating from SharePoint 2016 to 2019, development of new SharePoint sites using SharePoint Designer and Nintex Forms and Workflow, and guidance on industry best practices for the RCMP’s SharePoint implementation called the Integrated Collaborative Environment (ICE) tool.
duration_in_months: After the last tender closing date (2022-08-23), the earliest available contract start date is 2022-08-24.
